tool.name: PSMFeatureExtractor
tool.description: Computes extra features for each input PSM.

param.name: out_type
param.label: Output file type -- default: determined from file extension or content

param.name: extra
param.label: List of the MetaData parameters to be included in a feature set for precolato
param.help: (space separated list, in order to allow for spaces in list items surround them by single quotes)

param.name: multiple_search_engines
param.label: Combine PSMs from different search engines by merging on scan level

param.name: skip_db_check
param.label: Manual override to skip the check if same settings for multiple search engines were applied

param.name: concat
param.label: Naive merging of PSMs from different search engines: concatenate multiple search results instead of merging on scan level

param.name: impute
param.label: Will instead of discarding all PSM not unanimously detected by all SE, impute missing values by their respective scores min/max observed

param.name: limit_imputation
param.label: Will impute missing scores with the worst numerical limit (instead of min/max observed) of the respective score

tool.help:
Computes extra features for each input PSM.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/documentation/UTILS_PSMFeatureExtractor.html
